Comment: That’s funny, when it comes to pro life or Christian’s who believe lgbtqia- is a sn, they have no problems dismissing due process.  But antisemitism and damaging protests against Trump is protected speech.  What a crock of shit.

Comment: By 'due process' they mean their own invented due process which subjects people to court-like proceedings without using our actual courts. In other words, they're appointing themselves judges.
